show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: The Middle Path EcoSocial Vision
content: Charlene Spretnak talks with Asoka Bandarage about her new book, Sustainability and Well-Being, regarding her analysis... <!--more--> of recent dynamics in Sri Lanka and her Buddhist-inflected vision of seeking the balance of the Middle Way in our ideas and project for a just and sustainable future; poem by Gerard Manley Hopkins
